title: Zero-Trust Architecture
content: Zero-trust architecture treats every access request as untrusted. Itâ€™s a radical model where no user or device is trusted by default. Instead, continuous authentication and strict access policies are enforced.

title: How I Debug Like a Psychopath
content: Step 1: Panic. Step 2: Add print statements. Step 3: Sacrifice a rubber duck. Step 4: It magically works and I forget to commit for 6 hours.
